website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy, cuddly, sweet, and stuffed with fluff, this charmingly crafted plush is the ultimate Winnie the Pooh toy on the market.
pros: Pooh easily sits still due to the weighted beans in his bottom
Just as cuddly as he is in the films

customer_reviews.title: Looked mean and scary
customer_reviews.text: The bear was in OK condition but he looked mean. I had to return it. No way I was going to give this to a child. It scared me!!! I don't know what happened to Poo Bear but Eeyore, Piglet, and Tigger were all fine....looked like they should and nice and soft. Poor Poo Bear.
customer_reviews.author: Mary V Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great price and a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Top notch quality at an affordable price! Someone’s in love!
customer_reviews.author: Suzan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for autistics!
customer_reviews.text: I have autism and my grandmother purchased this Winnie-the-Pooh for me. It is PERFECT! It is EXTREMELY soft! I can't stop kissing him! He makes me feel so very comfortable. We sing the Pooh Bear theme song together. I highly, highly recommend this to fellow autistics like me!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: The item looks a fake one of disney?
customer_reviews.text: When i open the box, I was suprised that the price label was torn off by some people. Then I checked the brand logo, I found that the logo looks different with my other toys that I bought from Disney store offline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: A legit Disney Pooh Bear
customer_reviews.text: The local Disney store and the online Disney store were both out of Pooh Bears (unless you wanted a specialty version). Looking on various website showed a lot of knockoffs but this one looked good in the photos and what I received was clearly a legitimate Disney product. The bear is well made and very soft. It came with the appropriate tags and in a Disney plastic bag. The only issue was that it arrived tightly packaged in that bag and the face was smooshed. I worked it out so it looked normal; after a little bit it looked funny again. Some time and a couple of strategic squishes later and now it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: retro.joe

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cuddly Winnie the Pooh
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as part of a baby shower gift along with a volume of Winnie the Pooh stories. This bear is divine. He is perfectly adorable, high quality, and oh so very soft and squishable. This bear is done so well, from the little Pooh shirt and the embroidered name, the colors chosen are just perfect, the plush fabric of the bear itself, the details on the face, the posture he's in as he sits, to the overall cuddle factor, this little bear is going to be our great niece's best little buddy for many, many years to come. I highly recommend this sweet Winnie the Pooh. I expect nothing less from Disney, so well done, once again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST AND MY FAVORITE MAGICAL BEAR
customer_reviews.text: My favorite friend forever. I am a really big ex football player and tactical minded dude. But if not for the Poohbear inside; I would be half the man. I have had a lifelong connection with Disney (Disneyland especially). I even worked through a rigorous managerial program and worked in the park for several years as my first job after college. The characters like Winnie and the brilliance of art with joy is what this place is about forever in my mind. But along with some other Disneyland items; I have been sending my mom several gifts to remind her of my love and the memories that are still clear and magic.
customer_reviews.author: Major T.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and squeezable
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful stuffed animal. Extremely soft fur with a bit of beanbag stuffing in the bottom. He’s a bit bigger than I expected, which is great. Super cute and squeezable. I bought it for my 5 month old and now my 5 year old wants one too. A great stuffed animal all around. Would also make a excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My two year old is obsessed with Pooh, and this was the only genuinely authentic-looking Pooh bear I could find outside of the $60 ones from Disneyland. This one came in close second, and upon opening it on Christmas she was in love. It's affordable, durable, and very soft. Very happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two Winnie the Pooh plush medium stuffed toy. The one on the right was the first that I received for 18.99. The toy on the left same price but looks nothing like the first. I'm not happy and very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: KAREN COOPER
